com.upsight.android.marketing

Interface UpsightContentMediator

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultContentMediator

    public interface UpsightContentMediator
    The UpsightContentMediator interface implemented by components that supply billboards with content. The implementations should be registered with the SDK via UpsightBillboardManager.registerContentMediator(UpsightContentMediator).

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void displayContent(MarketingContent content, android.view.ViewGroup viewGroup)
      Displays the content.
      java.lang.String getContentProvider()
      The name of the content provider backing this mediator.
      void hideContent(MarketingContent content, android.view.ViewGroup viewGroup)
      Hides the content.
      boolean isAvailable()
      Checks whether the component is initialized and available.

    • Method Detail

      • isAvailable

        boolean isAvailable()
        Checks whether the component is initialized and available.
        Returns:
        true if available; false otherwise.

      • getContentProvider

        java.lang.String getContentProvider()
        The name of the content provider backing this mediator. This should be unique across the system.
        Returns:
        The content provider name.

      • displayContent

        void displayContent(MarketingContent content,
                  android.view.ViewGroup viewGroup)
        Displays the content.
        Parameters:
        content - The MarketingContent.
        viewGroup - The ViewGroup to attach the content.

      • hideContent

        void hideContent(MarketingContent content,
               android.view.ViewGroup viewGroup)
        Hides the content.
        Parameters:
        content - The MarketingContent.
        viewGroup - The ViewGroup to detach the content from.
